divs: Sighting DetailsI lived about three miles from the mountains on the western side of Fort Collins. I was sitting outside facing south, toward Loveland when I noticed a bright light in the sky. I thought at first a plane of course, but then I noticed three helicopters rising up toward this light, it stayed a few minutes then shot upward. I even got my husband and son to come out and look at it as none of us had ever seen something like this.
Summary: I saw a bright oval shape in the sky.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around June 30th 1989
